meanings.definition: The quality or state of being angular.
meanings.sent1: The angularities of the building's design stood out.
meanings.sent2: She admired the angularities of the sculpture.
meanings.sent3: The angularities of the puzzle made it challenging to solve.
meanings.sent4: His face had the angularities of a statue carved from stone.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the angularities of the landscape in the painting.

meanings.sent1: Her angularities features gave her a unique look.
meanings.sent2: The car's design had angularities lines and edges.
meanings.sent3: The angularities shape of the vase made it prone to tipping over.
meanings.sent4: The angularities angles of the room created interesting shadows.
meanings.sent5: The tree branches had angularities twists and turns.

meanings.sent1: Be careful of the angularities corners of the table.
meanings.sent2: The angularities edges of the paper cut his finger.
meanings.sent3: The angularities edges of the book cover were worn from use.
meanings.sent4: The angularities corners of the box were reinforced for durability.
meanings.sent5: The angularities edges of the cliff were dangerous to climb.
